main.name: Marie Lenac
main.description: Working on launching a game changing social impact platform with the startup, NEDDIE.
main.bio: I am a tenacious and dynamic individual looking for new opportunities and career advancement. I'm very process focused and I have been applying that to various roles in the sales & sales ops space. I have a knack for creative problem solving and I'm committed to sustainability and long term progress. Helping others is something that gives me fulfillment in life and at work, I want to foster a sense of teamwork and collaboration wherever I go.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some the skills I learned in my bootcamp & acquired through job experience

education.description: Recieved my undergraduate degree in psychology, as well as completing minor studies in visual art & merchandising.  I participated in collegiate sports, Rugby and Soccer

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Full Stack Intern using primarily Typescript and React/Redux, Mongo DB.  Currently working on the soft launch of the platform with feaure rollouts happening as soon as September 2020.  Gaining experience working on a small dev team, Stripe payment implementation, ground up building of PWA.

work.title: Customization Operations
work.description: Main point of contact for everything branding & decoration.  We printed, engraved or otherwise customized thousands of products.  My duties included graphic and logo design, production management, training, specialty operations tasks and much more.  I was laid off in Jan 2020 because of company downsizing

work.title: Inventory Operations Specialist
work.description: Monitoring Inventory and sales in a retail location.  I was in charge of managing all the inventory coming in and out of the store via deliveries, markouts and sales.  Created and exectuted the 'Wireless Workshops' for my location, serving 100s of people per month with hand held device instruction sessions.

projects.category: My first group project in Bootcamp.  Front End based using HTML/CSS/JS

projects.category: My second group project in Bootcamp, check back here for updates!
